name: Transportation
description: Common words and phrases for traveling by plane, train, bus, taxi, and other forms of transport.

vocabularies.sentence: We found the taxi stand outside the hotel.
vocabularies.definition: A designated area where taxis wait for passengers.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Watashitachi wa hoteru no soto de takushī noriba o mitsukemashita.
translations.translated_sentence: 私たちはホテルの外でタクシー乗り場を見つけました。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Wǒmen zài jiǔdiàn wài zhǎodào le chūzū chē zhàn.
translations.translated_sentence: 我们在酒店外找到了出租车站。

vocabularies.sentence: We took a taxi to the hotel.
vocabularies.definition: A car that can be hired to take passengers to a specific place.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Watashitachi wa hoteru made takushī ni norimashita.
translations.translated_sentence: 私たちはホテルまでタクシーに乗りました。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Wǒmen zuò chūzū chē qù jiǔdiàn.
